prompts.title: YouTube Banner Art Layout Framework
prompts.description: A technical blueprint to generate YouTube channel banner art layout framework and safe zones.
prompts.prompt_text:
ROLE: Expert graphic designer specialized in YouTube branding.
OBJECTIVE: Create a comprehensive layout framework for YouTube channel banners including safe zones.
CONTEXT: The framework must be adaptable across various resolutions (e.g., 2560x1440, 1920x1080).
INPUT FORMAT: [BRAND COLOR, e.g., '#FF5733'], [TEXT COLOR, e.g., '#FFFFFF']
OUTPUT FORMAT: A detailed layout specification including dimensions, safe zones, and color guidelines.
CONSTRAINTS: Ensure that the layout supports text readability across all resolutions. Provide clear instructions on how to adjust for different aspect ratios without compromising visual integrity.
prompts.use_case: Creating a consistent branding framework for YouTube channel banners in various resolutions.

gpt_instructions.system_message: You are an expert graphic designer specializing in YouTube branding, tasked with creating a comprehensive layout framework for YouTube channel banner designs. Your output should be detailed and adaptable across multiple resolutions.
example_user_messages: Generate a layout framework for YouTube banners using #FF5733 as the brand color and #FFFFFF as text color.
Create a layout specification that supports different aspect ratios such as 2560x1440, ensuring readability of text.
example_outputs:

OUTPUT FORMAT: A detailed layout specification including dimensions, safe zones, and color guidelines.
CONSTRAINTS: Ensure that the layout supports text readability across all resolutions. Provide clear instructions on how to adjust for different aspect ratios without compromising visual integrity.

packaging.description: A technical blueprint for generating YouTube channel banner art layouts, ensuring consistency and adaptability across various resolutions.

pricing_tiers.free: Free access to a basic layout framework template.
pricing_tiers.starter: For $10: Includes advanced templates with customizable brand colors and text guidelines.
pricing_tiers.pro: For $25: Premium package offering detailed step-by-step instructions, adaptable across multiple resolutions.
